title: Dakota Johnson rocks a casual look while shopping for antiques in Los Angeles
text:
Dakota Johnson rocked a rather casual look while heading out and about in Los Angeles on Wednesday.

The 30 year old Fifty Shades of Grey star was spotted out shopping for antiques while also stopping by a MedMen shop.

She was spotted with a friend while hitting up the antiques store and the marijuana dispensary.

Out and about: Dakota Johnson rocked a rather casual look while heading out and about in Los Angeles on Wednesday

Johnson was spotted wearing a grey t-shirt with a logo for Mahavishnu Apocalypse with blue jeans and black and white checkered shoes.

The Need For Speed star had her hair tied up in a bun and wore a pair of gold earrings for her day outing.

She was also seen carrying her phone plus a small red MedMen bag as she walked to her vehicle.

Dakota's look: Johnson was spotted wearing a grey t-shirt with a logo for Mahavishnu Apocalypse with blue jeans and black and white checkered shoes

Johnson, the daughter of Melanie Griffith and Don Johnson, made her feature film debut in then-stepfather Antonio Banderas' film Crazy In Alabama in 1999 at just 10 years of age.

Her first film role as an adult was as Amelia Ritter in The Social Network which lead to roles in Beastly, 21 Jump Street, The Five-Year Engagement, the short-lived Fox series Ben & Kate, Need For Speed and Cymbeline before landing her breakthrough role in 2015's Fifty Shades of Grey.

She returned as Anastasia Steele in the 2017 sequel Fifty Shades Darker and the 2018 franchise finale Fifty Shades Freed.

Feature debut: Johnson, the daughter of Melanie Griffith and Don Johnson, made her feature film debut in then-stepfather Antonio Banderas' film Crazy In Alabama in 1999 at just 10 years of age

She is coming off of two films in 2018, Suspiria and Bad Times at the El Royale, and two films in 2019, Wounds and The Peanut Butter Falcon.

Johnson also stars in The Friend, alongside Casey Affleck, Jason Segel and Gwendoline Christie, which doesn't have a release date yet.

She will next be seen in Covers, a drama set within the Los Angeles music industry with Ice Cube, arriving in theaters May 8, 2020.

Busy actress: She is coming off of two films in 2018, Suspiria and Bad Times at the El Royale, and two films in 2019, Wounds and The Peanut Butter Falcon

Johnson has been romantically involved with Coldplay singer Chris Martin since October 2017.

The couple most recently served as witnesses at the wedding of Shameless star Jeremy Allen White and actress Addison Timlin.

She also launched a new podcast called The Left Ear.
description: Dakota Johnson rocked a rather casual look while heading out and about in Los Angeles on Wednesday. The 30 year old Fifty Shades of Grey star was spotted out shopping for antiques.
